title: Furi
description:
You were captured. Look what they’ve done to you The jailer is the key, kill him and you’ll be free. Fight your way free in this ultra-responsive, fast-paced sword fighting and dual-stick shooting game. Boss design by Takashi Okazaki. Fire Pro Wrestling World
Original soundtrack by Carpenter Brut, Danger, The Toxic Avenger, Lorn, Scattle, Waveshaper and Kn1ght Rediscover Furi with the Onnamusha Rider: a powerful fighter that alternates between two stances: fast and agile or slower but lethal, until she’s able to unleash the devastating power of the Star.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Phenom II X4
system_requirements.Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 / AMD R7 250 (1GB VRAM min) (for 720p 60FPS)
